item.title: Fixing OpenStack noVNC consoles that ignore keyboard input
item.description: I opened up a noVNC console to a virtual machine today in my OpenStack cloud but found that the console wouldn’t take keyboard input.

item.title: Enabling VNC as a pseudo-KVM with VMWare Server
item.description: Mac users feel a little left out when it comes to VMWare Server clients.
